abstract.t: This document specifies the HTTP MAC access authentication scheme, an HTTP authentication method using a message authentication code (MAC) algorithm to provide cryptographic verification of portions of HTTP requests. The document also defines an OAuth 2.0 binding for use as an access token type. NOTE: This document (and other OAuth 2.0 security documents, such as [I-D.tschofenig-oauth-hotk]) are still work in progress in the OAuth working group. As such, the content of this document may change. For a discussion about security requirements please consult [I-D.tschofenig-oauth-security]. Your input on the detailed security requirements is highly appreciated.
